TneTabControl.HintType Property

Summary

Defines the type of the hint

Namespace: neTabControl
Syntax
Delphi
published
 property HintType: TneHintType read fHintType write fHintType default TneHintType.Off;

Property Value

Type: TneHintType

Value
Description

Off

No hint (default0

Text

Shows the value of HintText property. If it is empty, it shows the title of the tab

Preview

Shows a preview of the tab item

Custom

See Also

Reference

  • TneTabControl
